DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate effectivity bupivacaine 0,5 % post-operative analgesia intravitreal silicone evacutaion surgery
DOC.brief_title: Subconjunctiva Bupivacaine Analgesia Intravitreal Silicone Oil Removal
DOC.detailed_description: Approval Ethical Committee Faculty Medicine Universitas Indonesia acquire prior conduct study . Subjects give informed consent enrol study randomize two group . Intravenous ( IV ) cannule Ringer Lactate fluid , non-invasive blood pressure monitor , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) pulse-oxymetry set subject operation room . Co-induction do midazolam 0,05 mg/kg fentanyl 2 mcg/kg . Induction do propofol 1-2 mg/kg , follow Laryngeal Mask insertion facilitate atracurium 0,5 mg/kg . Maintenance do sevoflurane 1-2 vol % , O2 : H2O = 1:2 , flow 2 liter/minute . Surgery start . After final stitching , Group 1 receive subconjunctival bupivacaine 0,5 % 2,5ml stitch ; Group 2 receive subconjunctival NaCl 0,9 % stitch . Both group receive paracetamol 20 mg/kgBW IV post-operative analgesic . Hemodynamic , pain degree ( use Visual Analog Scale / VAS ) , nausea/vomiting incidence , time first request additional analgesia record . Data analyze use SPSS ( Statistical Package Social Scientist ) , numerical data use unpaired T-test Mann-Whitney-U test , categorical data use Chi-square test Fischer Exact 's Test . Data normality test Kolmogorov-Smirnov test . Significant value p < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 1860 year old , ASA physical status III BMI 18,530 kg/m2 plan intravitreal silicone evacuation surgery . Subjects explain study , agree enroll sign informed consent form Subjects history postoperative chronic pain Subjects history preoperative long term use analgesic Subjects history local anesthetic allergy , pregnant subject Subjects ambulation operation Subjects glaucoma ocular hypertension Subjects cognition dysfunction communication disturbance Subjects additional surgery silicone oil removal Drop Out criterion : Subjects intraoperative complication ( e.g . shock , anaphylactic reaction , seizure , severe respiratory disturbance ) Subjects postoperative intraocular pressure > 22mmHg .
